text: Stjepan "Stipe" Mesić (; born 24 December 1934) is a Croatian politician. He served as the President of Croatia from 2000 to 2010. He was the last President of the Presidency of Yugoslavia (1991) and served as Secretary General of the Non-Aligned Movement (1991), as well as Speaker of the Croatian Parliament (1992–1994), a judge in Našice and mayor of his home town of Orahovica. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Croatia Category:Presidents of Croatia Category:Presidents of Yugoslavia
title: Stjepan Mesić
